QuestData.Title: Acquisition: Blazing Ingots
QuestData.Description:
<The runesmiths have imbued this ingot with an enchantment that causes it to burn with inextinguishable flames.
It is likely that this metal is used to empower the Mawsworn protectors of Zovaal's Cauldron.
Bringing some samples of this ore to Ve'nari could aid her attempts at unlocking the Jailer's secrets.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $1oa Blazing Ingots and return them to Ve'nari in the Maw.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Ve'nari at Ve'nari's Refuge.
QuestData.RewardText:
Intriguing. I had often wondered what differentiated the Cauldron's protectors from the rest of the Mawsworn.
I hope these weren't too difficult for you to procure.
